question that they'll ask for every single interviewee and the thing is is that when you prepare a technical

it um run but now how do you make it per more performant right or what do you do
when the data set is changed so you have to be able to sort of if the person figures out the algorithm or the data

and so the question that you prepare as an interviewer has to be ready for that kind of thing and as a result the
